name: Lounge-assistant
body:
### Welcome to Lounge Assistant.
Lounge Assistant is a [GreaseMonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/) script that
improves the look and the functionnality of [csgolounge](http://csgolounge.com)

It's deeply inspired by [Lounge Companion](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lounge-companion-dota-2-c/pokidbfaabncipciiigfhncfmgmdjdaj?hl=en). And it tries to mimic the comportement.

![](http://i.imgur.com/3t0uB4t.png)
### Installation
First you need to install [GreaseMonkey](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/) by clicking on this link  https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/greasemonkey/

After that you just need to click on this [link](https://github.com/LoungeAssistant/Lounge-Assistant/raw/master/Lounge_Assistant.user.js), a popup will open asking you if want to install.

Everything is ready to go, you just need to log on [csgolounge](http://csgolounge.com)
### Functionality

* Fancy design
* Display item price on hover
* Display item quality 
* Enhanced Item Preview
* Auto update 


### It's open source !

Everything is open source, so feel free to contribute on github on this [repository](https://github.com/LoungeAssistant/Lounge-Assistant)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? contact me at loungeassistant@bi.tk and â€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
